entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
